queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[5].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[5].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[4].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[4].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[4].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[4].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[5].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[5].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=yunikorn-scheduler.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=yunikorn-scheduler.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=yunikorn-scheduler.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=yunikorn-scheduler.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, watch, list, update) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller-role}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller-role}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, watch, list, update) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "watch", "list", "update"]]
The metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller-role}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "watch", "list", "update"]]

queries.description: Container should not share the host network namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{yunikorn-admission-controller}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{yunikorn-admission-controller}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-scheduler-web.securityContext should be set
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-scheduler-k8s.securityContext should be set
metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-admission-controller.securityContext should be set

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-scheduler-k8s has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-scheduler-k8s does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-scheduler-web has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-scheduler-web does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-admission-controller has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=yunikorn-admission-controller does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-k8s}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-admission-controller}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{yunikorn-scheduler}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{yunikorn-scheduler-web}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
